title: Delicate Rose Gold Mangalsutra Set with Diamond-Cut Pendants
features: Two-layered chain design with dainty black beads interspersed along the rose gold plated chain. Features two floral-shaped pendants set with sparkling diamond-cut cubic zirconia stones, showcasing a modern take on a traditional symbol.
occasions: Modern occasions that call for a subtle and elegant expression of marital status
description: A lightweight and contemporary mangalsutra perfect for everyday wear. The rose gold finish provides a modern touch, while the black beads retain the traditional significance. The dazzling cubic zirconia pendants add a touch of sparkle and sophistication.
